introduction_id: Robot Pemadam Kebakaran (Penyemprotan Busa) adalah perangkat yang dirancang khusus untuk tugas pemadaman kebakaran. Perangkat ini terutama digunakan di area berbahaya seperti lokasi petrokimia, tangki minyak, gudang besar, dan bangunan di mana suhu tinggi, radiasi panas yang intens, dan potensi keruntuhan menyulitkan akses truk pemadam kebakaran dan personel. Dengan menggunakan robot busa pemadam kebakaran, korban jiwa personel dapat dihindari, dan pemadaman serta pendinginan yang efektif dapat tercapai.
features_en: Features a self-developed wheel chassis with superior performance
Utilizes a 10.1-inch screen wireless remote control
with a wireless control visibility distance of up to 1 kilometer
Uses an electrically controlled dual-purpose water/foam cannon with a water flow rate of 40 L/s and afoam flow rate of 96
Includes a water mist cooling system for temperature reduction
Comes with a high-capacity lithium battery
offering up to 3.5 hours of continuous operation
Features a highly integrated handheld wireless remote control with a display that provides real-timeinformation on temperature
Eauipped with an ultrasonic radar obstacle avoidance system
automatically detecting obstacles andhalting movement when they are less than 50cm away
description_en: Fire Fighting Robot (Foam Spraying) is a device specifically designed for firefighting tasks. It is primarily used in hazardous areas such as petrochemical sites, oil tank farms, large warehouses, and buildings where high temperatures, intense heat radiation, and potential collapses make it difficult for fire trucks and personnel to access. By using the firefighting foam robot, personnel casualties can be avoided, and effective firefighting and cooling can be achieved.
introduction_en: Fire Fighting Robot (Foam Spraying) is a device specifically designed for firefighting tasks. It is primarily used in hazardous areas such as petrochemical sites, oil tank farms, large warehouses, and buildings where high temperatures, intense heat radiation, and potential collapses make it difficult for fire trucks and personnel to access. By using the firefighting foam robot, personnel casualties can be avoided, and effective firefighting and cooling can be achieved.

parameter_id.label: Peringkat IECEx
parameter_id.value: Ex db eb mb IIB T4 Gb

parameter_id.label: Deteksi Gas
parameter_id.value: EX, CO, O2, H2S, SO2, NH3, HCI, NO2 (Dapat Disesuaikan)

parameter_id.label: Mode Kontrol
parameter_id.value: Layar 10,1 Inci dengan Remote Kontrol Nirkabel

features_id: Dilengkapi sasis roda yang dikembangkan sendiri dengan performa superior
dengan jarak pandang kontrol nirkabel hingga 1 kilometer
Menggunakan meriam air/busa serbaguna yang dikontrol secara elektrik dengan laju aliran air 40 L/dtk dan laju aliran busa 96.000 L/mnt
Dilengkapi sistem pendingin kabut air untuk menurunkan suhu
meningkatkan efektivitasnya dalam skenario suhu tinggi
Dilengkapi remote control nirkabel genggam yang sangat terintegrasi dengan layar yang memberikan informasi waktu nyata tentang suhu
Dilengkapi dengan sistem penghindaran rintangan radar ultrasonik
yang secara otomatis mendeteksi rintangan dan menghentikan gerakan ketika jaraknya kurang dari 50 cm
